web_snippets: Charles Marsh is professor of religious studies and director of the Project on Lived Theology at the University of Virginia. He is a graduate of Harvard ...
Charles Marsh, Commonwealth Professor of Religious Studies; Director, Project on Lived Theology, crm3p@virginia.edu, 434-924-6839
Theologian Charles Marsh is editor, with Wayne Whitson Floyd, Jr., of Theology and the Practice of Responsibility: Essays on Dietrich Bonhoeffer.
